Program Description: Rebate of $1,000 available for each qualifying Electric Vehicle charging station, up to 50% of price
Rebate Value: Up to $1000, or no more than 1/2 of the price of installing the charger
Equipment Standards Restrictions: Must be Level 2 or higher, 240 volt.
Contractor Restrictions: Installation must be made by Arizona licensed Electricians
Other Restrictions: Must have programable controls and/or have wi-fi capabilities, and must not be used during On-Peak periods. Must be wall or pedestal mounted (not portable). Must be for a highway rated vehicle (no golf cart chargers)

Program Description: Rebate of $500 for each 5 kWh minimum usable capacity battery unit installed on or after Jan 9, 2022
Equipment Capacity Restrictions: 5 kWh, minimum usable capacity battery unit
Equipment Standards Restrictions: Must have programable controls and/or have wi-fi capabilities and must not be charged during On-Peak periods
Other Restrictions: rebate application must be accompanied by installation receipts and approved building permits
